steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
match (n:esco__Skill) -- (o:esco__Occupation) where o.skos__prefLabel in [ 'actor/actress', 'administrative assistant', 'immigration officer', 'steward/stewardess', 'residential care home worker', 'chief executive officer', 'civil engineer', 'building', 'construction worker', 'electrician', 'emergency medical dispatcher', 'mixed farmer', 'member of parliament', 'executive assistant', 'police officer', 'postman/postwoman', 'primary', 'school teacher', 'sales assistant', 'social worker', 'train driver', 'waiter/waitress']
unwind n.skos__prefLabel as prefLabels
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: prefLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(l)

match (n:esco__Skill) -- (o:esco__Occupation) where o.skos__prefLabel in [ 'actor/actress', 'administrative assistant', 'immigration officer', 'steward/stewardess', 'residential care home worker', 'chief executive officer', 'civil engineer', 'building', 'construction worker', 'electrician', 'emergency medical dispatcher', 'mixed farmer', 'member of parliament', 'executive assistant', 'police officer', 'postman/postwoman', 'primary', 'school teacher', 'sales assistant', 'social worker', 'train driver', 'waiter/waitress']
unwind n.skos__altLabel as altLabels
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:hasAltLabel]->(l)

match (n:esco__Skill) -- (o:esco__Occupation) where o.skos__prefLabel in [ 'actor/actress', 'administrative assistant', 'immigration officer', 'steward/stewardess', 'residential care home worker', 'chief executive officer', 'civil engineer', 'building', 'construction worker', 'electrician', 'emergency medical dispatcher', 'mixed farmer', 'member of parliament', 'executive assistant', 'police officer', 'postman/postwoman', 'primary', 'school teacher', 'sales assistant', 'social worker', 'train driver', 'waiter/waitress']
unwind n.skos__hiddenLabel as hiddenLabels
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: hiddenLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:hasHiddenLabel]->(l)
